text: Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for January 13-19 2025 include Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy and Love Island All Stars Season 2. January 14, Tuesday, brings Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy to Peacock. This documentary is expected to focus on controversial rapper and record producer Sean “Diddy” Combs. Through never-before-seen footage and stories from his close acquaintances and friends, fans will get an in-depth look into the artist’s career and personal life. Love Island All Stars Season 2 makes its way onto the platform on January 15. Narrated by Iain Sterling and hosted by Maya Jama, the reality series, like other Love Island shows, follows contestants as they attempt to survive in a remote villa by coupling with another contestant. The winning couple gets a large cash prize. Also dropping on Peacock this week is Here Come the Irish Season 1. Here Come the Irish is a sports documentary reality series. This series offers viewers an in-depth look into the professional and personal lives of the highly popular University of Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team. New Peacock releases for January 13-19 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from January 13-19 2025. January 13 Critics Choice Awards 2025 (E!) Needle In A Timestack Una Maid En Manhattan, Season 1 (Telemundo) January 14 Brilliant Minds, Season 1 – Finale (NBC)  Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy – Premiere (Peacock Exclusive) January 15 Love Island, All Stars, Season 2 – Premiere (Peacock Exclusive) January 16 Here Come the Irish, Season 1 (Peacock Original)  Nymphomaniac Volume I  Nymphomaniac Volume II  The Real Housewives Of Salt Lake City, Season 1 – Finale, Uncensored & Extended (Bravo)  SNL50: Beyond Saturday Night, Season 1 – Premiere, 4 Episodes, 120 min (Peacock Original)  Team Mekbots: Animal Rescue, Season 1 – 7 Episodes (Peacock Original)  The Traitors, Season 3 – New Episode (Peacock Original)  January 17 Please Don’t Destroy: The Treasure Of Foggy Mountain Till January 19 Chasing Gold: Milan Cortina 2026, Season 1 (NBC The Perfect Setting For more Peacock content, learn more about the Grimm reboot being in the works for the platform. Also, Taylor Kitsch has teased his return in the Friday Night Lights reboot.
html:
Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for January 13-19 2025 include Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy and Love Island All Stars Season 2.

January 14, Tuesday, brings Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy to Peacock. This documentary is expected to focus on controversial rapper and record producer Sean “Diddy” Combs. Through never-before-seen footage and stories from his close acquaintances and friends, fans will get an in-depth look into the artist’s career and personal life.

Love Island All Stars Season 2 makes its way onto the platform on January 15. Narrated by Iain Sterling and hosted by Maya Jama, the reality series, like other Love Island shows, follows contestants as they attempt to survive in a remote villa by coupling with another contestant. The winning couple gets a large cash prize.

Also dropping on Peacock this week is Here Come the Irish Season 1.

Here Come the Irish is a sports documentary reality series. This series offers viewers an in-depth look into the professional and personal lives of the highly popular University of Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team.

New Peacock releases for January 13-19 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from January 13-19 2025.

January 13

  • Critics Choice Awards 2025 (E!)
  • Needle In A Timestack
  • Una Maid En Manhattan, Season 1 (Telemundo)

January 14

  • Brilliant Minds, Season 1 – Finale (NBC) 
  • Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy – Premiere (Peacock Exclusive)

January 15

  • Love Island, All Stars, Season 2 – Premiere (Peacock Exclusive)

January 16

  • Here Come the Irish, Season 1 (Peacock Original) 
  • Nymphomaniac Volume I 
  • Nymphomaniac Volume II 
  • The Real Housewives Of Salt Lake City, Season 1 – Finale, Uncensored & Extended (Bravo) 
  • SNL50: Beyond Saturday Night, Season 1 – Premiere, 4 Episodes, 120 min (Peacock Original) 
  • Team Mekbots: Animal Rescue, Season 1 – 7 Episodes (Peacock Original) 
  • The Traitors, Season 3 – New Episode (Peacock Original) 

January 17

  • Please Don’t Destroy: The Treasure Of Foggy Mountain
  • Till

January 19

  • Chasing Gold: Milan Cortina 2026, Season 1 (NBC
  • The Perfect Setting

For more Peacock content, learn more about the Grimm reboot being in the works for the platform. Also, Taylor Kitsch has teased his return in the Friday Night Lights reboot.
